# Metla House Cleaning - San Diego
> Premium residential cleaning services in San Diego, La Jolla, Pacific Beach, Coronado, Del Mar, and San Diego County.

## About Us
Metla House Cleaning provides premium residential cleaning services throughout San Diego County. We are a fully licensed, insured, and bonded cleaning company with background-checked professionals. Our team follows a 50-point cleaning checklist to ensure consistent, high-quality results for every home. Over 3 years of trusted excellence in San Diego.

## Services
- **Standard Cleaning**: Regular maintenance cleaning for homes
- **Deep Cleaning**: Thorough cleaning of all surfaces and hard-to-reach areas
- **Move-In/Move-Out Cleaning**: Comprehensive cleaning for property transitions
- **Post-Construction Cleaning**: Debris and dust removal after renovations
- **Vacation Rental Cleaning**: Airbnb and short-term rental turnover cleaning
- **Same Day Cleaning**: Urgent cleaning for last-minute requests (subject to availability)

## Service Areas
San Diego, La Jolla, Pacific Beach, Coronado, Del Mar, Encinitas, Carlsbad, Oceanside, Chula Vista, El Cajon, Santee, Poway, Rancho Bernardo, Scripps Ranch, Carmel Valley, Mission Valley, Hillcrest, North Park, Downtown San Diego
